name: L'Etape Gasconne
address: Place de la Mairie, 47800 Allemans-du-Dropt, France
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, a bar and a restaurant, L'Etape Gasconne is a hotel located in Allemans-du-Dropt. Free WiFi access is available. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Extras include a desk and ironing facilities.At L'Etape Gasconne you will find a garden and a terrace. Other facilities offered at the property include meeting facilities. Mérignac Airport is 50 mi away. Free public parking is available on site. Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8.6 for a two-person trip.L'Etape Gasconne has been welcoming Booking.com guests since May 4, 2015
